name: Cosmic Shinobi Passive T3
passiveSkills: Grants +50% increase to all stats in battle
Immune to all negative effects, including innate and unblockable stun, permadeath, taunt, and skill disabling effects
Every attack against any enemy deals true damage to all of their allies equal to 2% of their MAX HP
Every Perfect Hit against enemies deals 15% of their Max HP in true damage
This Talisman's effects only activates when equipped to a Shinobi character.
